A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Not only was TLJ the worst Star Wars move in the franchise\, it was the worst Star Wars story in the entire franchise.

Even worse\, it retroactively ruined TFA by going back and undoing everything that movie setup.

So now\, Disney has wasted two movies just as a way to "reset" the franchise while trying to appease the fanbase.

Clearly\, they wanted to move on from the characters in the old series\, which is fine\, but just do it offscreen.
